QuestData.Title: Hot Seat
QuestData.Description: <Apexis constructs are about to emerge from their ancient chambers on a warpath. The arakkoa are sure to send more sol-shapers to support them.$B$BThe interface and the turret hum in soft resonance.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Overseer's Chair to take control of the Apexis Turret and slay $1oa Apexis Destroyers and $2oa Adherent Sol-Shapers.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, well done. Even with my condition, I could sense the carnage from here.$B$BIt must have been quite a show, kah-hah-haww.
